title: OXO Garlic Press
description: The new, improved OXO Good Grips Garlic Press is now even stronger than ever. With sturdy, die-cast zinc construction and a large capacity garlic chamber, the Garlic Press crushes garlic with a simple squeeze. The efficient hole pattern easily pushes garlic through the Garlic Press. A built-in cleaner allows for easy cleaning; just flip the handles over to clean out excess garlic. The soft handles are slightly arched for comfort and absorb pressure while you squeeze.

asset.author: OXO
asset.description:

The new, improved OXO Good Grips Garlic Press is now even stronger than ever. With sturdy, die-cast zinc construction and a large capacity garlic chamber, the Garlic Press crushes garlic with a simple squeeze. The efficient hole pattern easily pushes garlic through the Garlic Press. A built-in cleaner allows for easy cleaning; just flip the handles over to clean out excess garlic. The soft handles are slightly arched for comfort and absorb pressure while you squeeze.

transcripts: Fresh garlic can make the difference between a good dish and a great dish we had two main objectives and we set out to create our garlic press easy to use and easy to clean. The new improved OXO garlic press is even stronger than ever with sturdy dyecast zinc construction and a large-capacity garlic chamber the garlic press crushes garlic with a simple squeeze a built-in cleaner allows for easy cleaning just slip the handles over to clean out excess garlic the soft handles are slightly arched for comfort and absorb pressure while you squeeze the garlic press is also dishwasher safe. Here's a good tip one OXO Baker uses our garlic press to press cookie dough to add hair to character cookies.
